title: Find k for to solve FTC question

content.question: If n is a known positive integer, for what value of k is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 1 to k of x to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses with respect to x equals 1 divided by n"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mi>k</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mi>n</mi> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaWGUbGaeyOe I0IaaGymaaaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdaa8aabaWdbiaadUgaa0Gaey4kIi pakiaadsgacaWG4bGaeyypa0ZaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdaa8aabaWd biaad6gaaaaaaa@4352@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> ?

choices.label: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="open parentheses 2 divided by n close parentheses to the power of open parentheses 1 divided by n close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mfrac> <mn>2</mn> <mi>n</mi> </mfrac> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaGGOaWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaikdaa8aabaWdbiaad6gaaaGaaiyk a8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIXaGaai4laiaad6gaaaaaaa@3C19@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="open parentheses open parentheses 2 times n minus 1 close parentheses divided by n close parentheses to the power of open parentheses 1 divided by n close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <mi>n</mi> </mfrac> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaGGOaWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaikdacaWGUbGaeyOeI0IaaGymaaWd aeaapeGaamOBaaaacaGGPaWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaigdacaGGVa GaamOBaaaaaaa@3EB4@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="2 to the power of open parentheses 1 divided by n close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mn>2</mn> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIYaWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaigdacaGGVaGaamOBaaaaaaa@397F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

content.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="2 to the power of open parentheses 1 divided by n close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mn>2</mn> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIYaWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaigdacaGGVaGaamOBaaaaaaa@397F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
